author: Nick Nairn
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the carrots onto a baking sheet, add the garlic cloves, rosemary and cumin seeds and season generously with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Mix together. Place in the oven and roast for 10-15 minutes, or until the carrots are tender and golden-brown.  To serve, transfer the carrots to a serving bowl and garnish with the chopped chives.
ingredients: 150g/5Â½oz Chantenay carrots, or other small carrots,  drizzle olive oil,  2 garlic cloves, unpeeled,  1 sprig rosemary,  1 tsp cumin seeds,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to garnish
